item.name: rusty key
item.description: The key is rusty, and looks well used. It looks like it would fit a door lock.

item.name: winding spring
item.description: The missing winding spring from the rabbit's pocket watch.

item.name: crown wheel
item.description: It is the missing crown wheel from the rabbit's pocket watch.

item.name: minute hand
item.description: It is the missing crown wheel from the rabbit's pocket watch.

item.name: balance screw
item.description: It is the missing balance screw from the rabbit's pocket watch.

item.name: piece of cake
item.description: The cake has red frosting, there is a message on it that says "Eat Me".

item.name: small bottle
item.description: A small glass bottle. It is empty, the label says "drink me".

item.name: paint brush
item.description: The paint brush is covered in red paint. It was used to paint the roses red.

item.name: flamingo mallet
item.description: The flamingo is being used as a mallet for the croquet game.

item.name: piece of a mushroom
item.description: A piece of the mushroom. It is SPOTTED.

item.name: overturned tea cup
item.description: An overturned SPOTTED tea cup. You think you saw it move an inch.
